nodes.name: ReadCSV
nodes.description: It reads in CSV files and creates a DataFrame from it
nodes.hint: Whenever the file is changed, Refresh the Schema

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: path
fields.title: Path
fields.description: Path of the Text file/directory

fields.title: Separator
fields.description: CSV Separator

fields.name: header
fields.title: Header
fields.description: Does the file have a header row

fields.name: dropSpecialCharacterInColumnName
fields.title: Drop Special Character In ColumnName
fields.description: Drop the SpecialCharacter and Space in Column Name.

fields.name: dropMalformed
fields.title: Drop Malformed
fields.description: Whether to drop Malformed records or error

fields.name: outputColNames
fields.title: Column Names for the CSV
fields.description: New Output Columns of the SQL

fields.description: Data Type of the Output Columns

fields.name: outputColFormats
fields.title: Column Formats for the CSV
fields.description: Format of the Output Columns

nodes.name: ConcatColumns
nodes.description: This node creates a new DataFrame by concatenating the specified columns of the input DataFrame

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: inputCols
fields.title: Columns
fields.description: Columns to be concatenated

fields.name: outputCol
fields.title: Concatenated Column Name
fields.description: Column name for the concatenated columns

fields.name: sep
fields.title: Separator
fields.description: Separator to be used when concatenating the columns

nodes.name: StringToDate
nodes.description: This node converts string columns to date using the specified date/time format

fields.name: inputColNames
fields.title: Columns

fields.name: outputColNames
fields.title: Output Column Names
fields.description: Output Column Names

fields.name: outputColTypes

nodes.name: ColumnFilter
nodes.description: This node creates a new DataFrame that contains only the selected columns

fields.name: storageLevel

fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: outputCols

nodes.name: MovingWindowFunctions
nodes.description: This node calculates the moving values of selected functions for the field(input column).

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: windowStart
fields.title: Window Start
fields.description: value to be used to calculate the window from

fields.name: windowEnd
fields.title: Window End
fields.description: value to be used to calculate the window to

fields.name: partitionCol
fields.title: Partition Column Name
fields.description: partition column to split the incoming dataframe for the sliding/window operation

fields.name: orderCol
fields.title: Order Column Name
fields.description: the order of the selected column for the sliding/window operation

fields.name: inputCols
fields.title: Input Columns
fields.description: input column name for calc

nodes.name: filter NKE
nodes.description: This node creates a new DataFrame containing the rows that satisfy the given condition

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: conditionExpr
fields.title: Conditional Expression
fields.description: The filtering condition. Rows not satisfying given condition will be excluded from output DataFrame. eg: usd_pledged_real > 0 and (category = 1 or category == 2) and goal > 100

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: maxValuesToDisplay
fields.title: Max Values To Display
fields.description: Maximum number of values to display in result.

fields.name: isStreaming

fields.description: Whether the Graph is a Streaming Graph or not
